Text: Featured bird: The nonpareil (French for "with no equal") of the cardinal family (most probably got its nick from French discoverers, fur traders and other pioneers working at the mouth of and along the Mississippi, a nick French speaking Cajuns, deported to the area, also helped keep). I can only dream of seeing this colour "painted" bird one day feed in my open back porch along with cardinals and jays as this would require very fast adaptation to make its habitat extend up to New England and Nouvelle France in my lifetime.

Thank you.
I once watched this documentary on TV titled "Planet Wild - Hummingbird Sugar Rush".  I would love to watch it again. Would you have any leads. :)

This is Episode 11 of Season 01. I couldn't locate any recording from collectors (maybe later), except some clips on YouTube from user BBCPlanetWild. The 1st season is presently showing in many languages all over the Rock. "Check your local Animal Planet listings."
Thank you so much for trying. You are right. It is scheduled on Animal Planet. Yay ! Do let us know if anyone has / can upload the episode/collection.
